hero.description: Where tradition meets innovation. Crafting high-performance soles with cutting-edge technology and artisanal expertise for the global footwear industry.

product.description: Custom soles for every need, designed to combine functionality, comfort, and style. Adaptable to all types of footwear - from safety shoes to fashion.

aboutLegacy.subtitle: Historic leader in sole manufacturing - combining industrial excellence with unmatched expertise

1995.description: Casa Semelle was founded on January 16, 1995, in Casablanca with a clear vision: to become Morocco's reference in sole manufacturing through quality and innovation.

2020.description: Achieved #1 position in the Moroccan market, earning the trust of major local brands and establishing ourselves as the go-to partner for quality soles.

2022.description: Partnership with Inditex Group validates our capacity to meet world-class standards. Expanded material expertise across EVA, Rubber, PU, TPU, TR, and Leather.

today.description: The historic leader serving major brands, industrial workshops, artisans, and international groups. Modern machinery combined with expert craftsmanship makes us the undisputed reference.

expertise.title: 30+ Years of Excellence
expertise.description: Founded in 1995, Casa Semelle has rapidly become Morocco's #1 sole manufacturer. Our team of highly skilled professionals masters the art of blending materials and technologies, creating diverse, customized solutions tailored to each customer's unique requirements - from major international brands to local artisans.

innovation.title: Complete Material Mastery
innovation.description: We master all major sole materials: EVA high density, PU, TPU, TR, Leather, PVC, and prefabricated soles. Our modern industrial machinery and expertise allow us to deliver exceptional quality across safety footwear, casual shoes, sandals, and custom designer solutions with superior performance and comfort.

flexibility.title: Partnership with Global Brands
flexibility.description: Casa Semelle is trusted by world-renowned groups including Inditex, confirming our ability to meet the highest international standards. We serve major Moroccan brands, industrial workshops, and artisans alike - delivering premium quality, on-time delivery, and exemplary consistency regardless of project scale.

description.paragraph1: Morocco's #1 sole manufacturer, combining modern machinery with expert craftsmanship. Trusted partner of major international brands.
description.paragraph2: Cutting-edge facilities handling any scale - custom orders to large production. Mastering 8+ materials with unmatched flexibility.
description.paragraph3: Custom solutions with designers and brands: colors, densities, branding, logos. Quality consistency that earned partnerships like Inditex.

hero.subtitle: Casa Semelle is the historic leader and number one in the Moroccan market for shoe sole manufacturing. With decades of expertise, we are the reference in the footwear and sole industry in Morocco.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide footwear manufacturers with innovative, durable, and high-performance soles that meet international standards and the specificities of the Moroccan market. We combine industrial excellence with customized solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To showcase Moroccan expertise in the footwear industry globally, serving performance, comfort, and durability. We aim to be the preferred partner for major brands and manufacturers across Morocco and internationally.

promise.title: Our Commitment
promise.description: Recognized expertise and dominant presence in the local market. Collaboration with world-renowned groups like Inditex. Modern industrial machinery and high production capacity. On-time delivery and exemplary quality consistency.

timeline.subtitle: From humble beginnings to becoming Morocco's undisputed leader in sole manufacturing

2000.title: Foundation of Casa Semelle
2000.description: The company was founded in 2000 by owner Aziz Benkhouili, starting completely from scratch. With a clear vision and strong determination, the business began as a small operation focused on buying and reselling outsoles to local footwear manufacturers. A strong reputation was built through consistency, hard work, and integrity.

2010.title: Industrial Transition
2010.description: After a decade of market experience and growth, the company made a decisive strategic shift: transitioning from outsole trading to full-scale manufacturing. The first production facility opened in Tit Mellil, marking the beginning of the evolution into a production-driven, industrial-grade operation.

2013.title: Capacity Growth
2013.description: Facing increasing demand, the company moved its manufacturing facility to Mediouna in 2013. This allowed for higher production capacity, advanced machinery, a wider range of outsole models, and a stronger presence in the national market.

2015.title: Strategic Milestone
2015.description: In 2015, CASA SEMELLE relocated to the industrial zone of Ain Seba√¢, one of Casablanca's most important industrial hubs. This move positioned the company at the center of the city's manufacturing ecosystem, where it continues to operate with precision, consistency, and a strong commitment to quality.

today.title: Trusted Manufacturer
today.description: Now established as a leading manufacturer, CASA SEMELLE continues to expand its capabilities, innovate its products, and serve factories, brands, and designers across Morocco and beyond. From a small trading business to a major industrial manufacturer, this journey is proof of what determination and commitment can achieve.

values.subtitle: The principles that made us Morocco's trusted sole manufacturing leader

quality.title: Excellence & Quality
quality.description: Our reputation is built on exemplary quality consistency and rigorous standards. Every sole meets international requirements while respecting delivery commitments.

trust.title: Trust & Expertise
trust.description: Recognized expertise that earned us partnerships with world-class groups. Our clients trust us for our technical mastery and production reliability.

innovation.title: Innovation & Technology
innovation.description: Modern industrial machinery and constant development of new solutions. We master all materials: EVA, PU, TPU, TR, Leather, PVC, and prefabricated soles.

customer.title: Custom Solutions
customer.description: Made-to-measure development for manufacturers and brands: custom colors, densities, branding, and logos. From cobblers to major brands, we adapt to every need.

team.subtitle: Skilled professionals driving Moroccan excellence in sole manufacturing

cta.subtitle: Join major brands who trust Casa Semelle for their sole manufacturing needs. Experience the expertise that made us the reference in the industry.

message.paragraph1: Since its inception, Casa Semelle has had a clear mission: to offer the Moroccan and international markets high-quality soles capable of meeting the requirements of the biggest brands.
message.paragraph2: Today, we are proud to be the leader of the national market, recognized for our expertise, our seriousness, and our commitment to our customers. Our collaboration with international groups testifies to our ability to meet the highest standards.
message.paragraph3: Our ambition remains the same: to continue innovating, strengthening local industry, and showcasing Moroccan expertise.
message.paragraph4: Thank you to all our partners for their trust. Together, we are moving towards an even more ambitious future.

leadership.title: Market Leadership
leadership.description: Morocco's #1 sole manufacturer, trusted by major brands and international groups.

growth.title: Continuous Innovation
growth.description: Investing in technology and expertise to strengthen local industry and meet global standards.

commitment.title: Customer First
commitment.description: Dedicated to excellence, reliability, and building lasting partnerships based on trust.

materials.subtitle: Casa Semelle masters all major sole materials, combining cutting-edge technology with expert craftsmanship to deliver superior quality across every category.

tr.name: TR (Thermoplastic Rubber)
tr.description: Thermoplastic Rubber combines the elasticity of rubber with the processability of plastic. It offers excellent flexibility, durability, and slip resistance.
tr.applications: Fashion shoes, kids' shoes, casual and comfort footwear

tpu.name: TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane)
tpu.description: TPU is a high-performance material known for its superior elasticity, toughness, and resistance to wear and tear. It provides a premium feel and long-lasting durability.

features.feature3: Resistant to oils, greases, and chemicals
features.feature4: Ideal for high-performance and transparent soles

tpu.applications: Sports shoes, safety boots, performance footwear

eva.name: EVA (Ethylene Vinyl Acetate)
eva.description: EVA is lightweight, shock-absorbent, and flexible, making it perfect for midsoles and lightweight outsole applications. It ensures superior comfort, cushioning, and energy return.

features.feature4: Can be combined with rubber for better grip

eva.applications: Running shoes, sandals, slippers, and lightweight footwear

pu.name: PU (Polyurethane)
pu.description: PU is widely used for durable, lightweight, and comfortable soles. It combines flexibility, abrasion resistance, and excellent shock absorption.

features.feature4: Comfortable and durable for long wear

pu.applications: Safety footwear, work shoes, dress shoes, and comfort shoes

pvc.name: PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride)
pvc.description: PVC is a versatile and economical material used for waterproof and durable soles. It offers a good balance of flexibility, toughness, and resistance to chemicals and water.

features.feature4: Suitable for various colors and textures

pvc.applications: Rain boots, fashion footwear, and economy shoes

rubber.name: Rubber / Caoutchouc
rubber.description: Natural and synthetic rubber for maximum durability and grip.
rubber.applications: Work boots, outdoor footwear, heavy-duty shoes

leather.name: Leather / Cuir
leather.description: Natural leather for classic elegance and breathability.
leather.applications: Dress shoes, formal footwear, luxury footwear

prefabricated.name: Prefabricated Soles
prefabricated.description: Ready-to-use sole solutions for fast production and consistency.
prefabricated.applications: Mass production, quick turnaround projects, standard footwear

cta.text: Need custom soles with specific materials? Let's discuss your project.

prefabricated.subtitle: We offer a wide range of prefabricated outsoles designed to fit different styles of footwear ‚Äî from classic men's dress shoes to women's fashion silhouettes. Our full catalogue includes various shapes, profiles, thicknesses, materials, and finishing options.

mens.title: Men's Dress Outsoles
mens.feature4: Suitable for Oxford, Derby, Moccasin styles

womens.title: Women's Leather Outsoles
womens.feature2: Front grip pattern for comfort & traction
womens.feature3: Slim silhouette for feminine footwear designs

pointed.title: Pointed Fashion Outsoles
pointed.feature3: Ideal for pumps and fashion shoes

inventory.title: Large Material Inventory
inventory.description: Our extensive stock of leather rolls, welts, and heel components ensures continuous production, reliable supply, and consistent finishing across all orders.

benefits.benefit1: Wide variety of outsole shapes & sizes
benefits.benefit2: Premium leather and durable rubber components
benefits.benefit4: Fast production thanks to material stock
benefits.benefit5: Customization possible on request (color, embossing, stitching, finish)

b2b.title: Available for B2B Orders
b2b.description: Our prefabricated outsoles are developed for businesses and professionals in the footwear industry:

video.title: See Our Craftsmanship in Action
video.description: Watch how we produce premium outsoles with precision and care
